text:
Your fingers close around the sacrificial knife. You feel a sharp stab of agony, but that soon passes. Suddenly you see that all items in your possession have melted away into a murky vile-smelling slime. You try to drop the knife, but you cannot.

But the knife is not all bad. Although cursed, it is a sacred weapon of the demon Vactris.

Now you have no choice but to return the way you came.
